# table-body-cell



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Overview

The table cell is a wrapper for a standard <td> element and should be used inside of table rows

## Slots

| Slot | Description                                  |
| ---- | -------------------------------------------- |
|      | The content you wish to display in the table |


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                                 | Description                    |
| ------------------------------------ | ------------------------------ |
| `--admiralty-table-cell-font-size`   | Font size for the table cell   |
| `--admiralty-table-cell-font-weight` | Font weight for the table cell |
| `--admiralty-table-cell-padding`     | Padding for the table cell     |
